scripts.test: mkdir -p dist/scripts && run-p build:vendorjs && karma start
scripts.test:firefox: mkdir -p dist/scripts && run-p build:vendorjs && karma start --browsers Firefox
scripts.test:chrome: mkdir -p dist/scripts && run-p build:vendorjs && karma start --browsers ChromeHeadless
scripts.test:watch: mkdir -p dist/scripts && run-p build:vendorjs && karma start --debug --no-single-run
scripts.buildcss:theme_usgs: lessc less/usgs_theme/custom.less > dist/nwis_qw_custom.css && uglifycss --output dist/nwis_qw_custom.css dist/nwis_qw_custom.css && postcss dist/nwis_qw_custom.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/nwis_qw_custom.css
scripts.buildcss:wqp_theme: lessc less/wqp_theme/custom.less > dist/custom.css && uglifycss --output dist/custom.css dist/custom.css && postcss dist/custom.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/custom.css
scripts.buildcss:vendor: lessc less/vendor.less > dist/vendor.css && uglifycss --output dist/vendor.css dist/vendor.css && postcss dist/vendor.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/vendor.css
scripts.build:images: mkdir -p dist/images dist/img && cp img/* dist/img && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* dist/images && cp node_modules/leaflet-draw/dist/images/* dist/images && cp node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/images/* dist/images
scripts.build:vendorjs: mkdir -p dist/scripts && concat -o dist/scripts/vendor.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/jquery-ui.min.js node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js node_modules/leaflet-easybutton/src/easy-button.js node_modules/esri-leaflet/dist/esri-leaflet.js node_modules/leaflet-providers/leaflet-providers.js node_modules/leaflet-draw/dist/leaflet.draw.js node_modules/leaflet.markercluster/dist/leaflet.markercluster.js node_modules/select2/dist/js/select2.full.min.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js node_modules/nanobar/nanobar.min.js
scripts.watch:js: mkdir -p dist/scripts && npm run build:vendorjs && rollup -c --watch
